title: Bug 15899 - Close all saved does not work all the time
OB:
When using build 20020508 with the latest UI code, the 'Close All Saved' function does not work consistently. The following steps consistently reproduce the issue:
1. Create a new file called f1.txt.
2. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.

Expected Behavior (EB):
The 'Close All Saved' function should close the file 'f1.txt' as no changes have been made.

Steps to Reproduce (SR):
1. Create a new file called f1.txt.
2. Select 'Close All Saved' from the file menu.

Note: 'Close All Saved' function does not work consistently.
